patch.description:
Rules:
  - companyName, description, philosophy, photo can be updated anytime
  - firstName, lastName, phone, website:
    • can be updated ONLY when operator status is "rejected"
    • after changing any of these fields, status is automatically set to "pending"
    • cannot be updated when status is "pending" or "approved"

description.example: We organize unforgettable tours across Europe

isMain.description: Is this the main photo for the tour?

url.description: URL of the photo (if already uploaded)

title.description: Title of the tour (e.g. "Weekend Getaway to Paris")

description.description: Detailed description of the tour program (e.g. "Explore the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and enjoy a Seine river cruise.")

cityId.description: ID міста призначення туру ((отримано з GET /countries/{countryCode}/cities))

price.description: Price per person for the tour (e.g., 1250.75)

startDate.description: Start date of the tour in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., 2025-08-15)

endDate.description: End date of the tour in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., 2025-08-22)

availableSpots.description: Number of available spots for the tour (e.g., 20)

conditions.description: Terms and conditions for the tour (e.g. "Includes accommodation, breakfast. Excludes flights.")

photos.description: Metadata for tour photos. The order should correspond to the uploaded files.

photo_files.description: Array of photos (1–10 files, JPG/PNG, max 5MB each)
